003892BF.Desc: The duration of {c_important}Earthen Bulwark{/c} is increased by {c_number}[Affix_Value_2]{/c} seconds. In addition, killing an enemy with {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills replenishes {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} of your active {c_important}Earthen Bulwark's{/c} {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c}.
